website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking watch with a modern design and highly contrasted face.
pros: Perfect fashion watch for everyday wear
Watch face is a stunning black with white and rose gold accents
This model stands out for its second hand and date display
cons: Black leather band doesn't offer much in terms of style

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful watch. Timeless classic style. Can be worn casually or dressed up. Yellow gold. I’ve had it for about a month now. It looks like it will hold up well. I got it to replace a cheaper but much loved timex watch I had for about 4 years. I’m sure I’ll use this one for at least that long. I love that I won’t have to replace the battery. The only feature it doesn’t have that I would have loved is a backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great quality watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch and the strap so much. It looks great from all angles, I like that it chargers from light. I had it for about a month so far and the leather strap still looks brand new. Def recommend this watch to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand for a long time. I am a # 1 fan. I don't have to worry about their batteries because they work with sunlight even on rainy days (jajaja). I already recommended it to my work colleagues. It is also very nice and you can use it for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Tessy

customer_reviews.title: Probably fake!
customer_reviews.text: Does not appear to be a real Citizen EcoDrive watch. No EcoDrive logo on the back of the watch (all other retailers like a Macy’s and Kohl’s and even the Citizen website show the logo). Came in a square box (all other retailers show round box). Probably fake, returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: It’s large enough that it is very easy to read the time and date yet fits my small wrist beautifully. This watch can easily be used for dressy and casual occasions. I love not having to worry about changing the battery any more.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this watch. It is absolutely beautiful. It has a classic design that compliments everything I have worn. The seller was very prompt. This watch was delivered the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Grant

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch easy to read. Larger face than I expected but fine on my (medium size) arm
customer_reviews.author: yum

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Nice that I don't need to change batteries anymore. The look of this black watch is great because, you can wear it with jeans to dress.
customer_reviews.author: Ojo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful eco drive watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, you can dress it up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Anita E

customer_reviews.title: No more batteries!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who are tired of watch batteries giving out, the Citizen Eco-Drive watches are for you. They run on solar or other light source and never need a battery. This watch is an exceptionally attractive ladies time piece that an be dressy or casual. I bought two, one for my soul mate and another as gift for another person. Great quality look with a very attractive leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: SpringFever

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Solar powered, band is comfortable, Easy to read. Glow in the dark feature would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Milagros Ja Cobs

customer_reviews.title: Never have to replace the battery again! Wear every day for work or play! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set and change. Love the look and get compliments on this watch. I would 100 percent buy this watch again!
customer_reviews.author: LovingAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy watch needs no batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch! So classy. Perfect size on my small wrist. Love never having to get batteries again!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: True to picture. Box was damaged but watch was not. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: DEB

feature_bullets: Eco-Drive technology - powered by light, any light. Never needs a battery.
Water resistant to 30m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
